name: Fairy Fencer F: Advent Dark Force
overview: Three Stories, Three Paths In three branching stories, friends become foes, foes become friends, and based on your choices, multiple endings can be unlocked! Shape the World Customize weapons by fusing them with fairies and change dungeon stats through World Shaping. Even power up Fencers through the fairies’ power to transform, or Fairize, during battle and change your world!
